bibl.title: Between Rome and Persia: The Middle Euphrates, Mesopotamia and Palmyra under Roman Control.
bibl.note: Chapter 3 (Roman Military Organization of the Middle Euphrates in the Third Century AD) draws on the papyri from Dura and the Euphrates.
bibl.seg: EDWELL Peter M., Between Rome and Persia: The Middle Euphrates, Mesopotamia and Palmyra under Roman Control.
London, Routledge, 2008, 8°, xx-289 pp., figg., cartes. ISBN 978-0-415-42478-3. £65.
Chapter 3 (Roman Military Organization of the Middle Euphrates in the Third Century AD) draws on the papyri from Dura and the Euphrates.
